mapper.insert: insert into tbl_winner (winner_no, winner_title, winner_content, winner_image) values (seq_winner_winnerno.nextval, #{winner_title}, #{winner_content}, #{winner_image, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.*from (select * from tbl_winner) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

choose.when: where title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
where title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
